Using fuel to blast themselves and their payloads

At launch about 90% of a rocket's weight is

Space elevators would actually work much better
on other planets mars for example has only

38% of the gravitational pull of earth which
means the space elevator could be shorter
and made from conventional materials.

Black holes are regions of space where gravity
is so strong that nothing can escape not even
light.
That's why they're called black holes.
